title: Looking for players to make a competitive gaming
body:
hey guys,

we are looking for a jungeler , top laner and an adc for competitive ranks. We are two chilled guys that are keen to take it to the next step. We don't mind what rank you are as long as you have the right attitude.  We are hoping to get a team together for the ACL tournament starting up, just to see how we go and see what we can achieve as a team. if you interested please reply or add me on skype: crossedbox

kind regards

replies.body: Hey I'm a mid and adc main, can play top fine. I had a ranked team a little while back and loved it, but it broke up, and I'm looking for a new team. Never really enjoyed solo q, so haven't climbed the ladder, but no teams here seem to want to take bronzies. Can play many champs in all roles. Not that great in jungle (my champ pool seemed to get shafted this season, lol). Anyway ill add you in game soon.

Hey im interested in the adc position i am very strong at my role and very flexible in champs only champ i will steer away from is draven im a passionate player who is looking for competetive play and would love you go on this journey with you my account name is BenQ liquidz
Been playing adc for a very long time

Hey there,
IGN: Minionmancer
I would love to be apart of your team! I don't mind being in any role but i mostly play top. My champs are Heimerdinger, Mordekaiser, Yorick, Wukong and many more. Give me a message if you're interested.
I'm willing to co-ordinate and be apart of the team!

Hi, 
If I join, can we take regular intervals for the team to dust my Bean Bag?
hey frostwolf :) ill send you a friends request in game :)
IGN: Frostwolf77. Can play any roles but adc. Have skype and currently in gold 5.
